title: plz introduce kotlin 1.8
body: ### outdated kotlin version https://quarkus.io/guides/kotlin#kotlin-version plz bump the kotlin version at least to 1.7.22 or better directly to 1.8. i have used it locally and it worked perfect. with latest java version the kotlin bump to 1.8 is no problem: ci as not the latest java but locally i have so it should be fine: openjdk 19.0.1 2022-10-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Homebrew (build 19.0.1) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Homebrew (build 19.0.1, mixed mode, sharing) Ich bekomme folgende Fehlermeldung:  ``` file:///C:/dev/therapybuilder/02_Software/TherapyExecutor/serverless/src/main/kotlin/com/movisens/therapydesigner/executor/serverless/persistence/repository/TherapyVariableValueRepository.kt:58:39 Unresolved reference. None of the following candidates is applicable because of receiver type mismatch: public inline fun Enumeration.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun Array.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun BooleanArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun ByteArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun CharArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun CharSequence.toList(): List defined in kotlin.text public fun DoubleArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun FloatArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun IntArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun LongArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun Pair.toList(): List defined in kotlin public fun ShortArray.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun Triple.toList(): List defined in kotlin public fun Iterable.toList(): List defined in kotlin.collections public fun Map.toList(): List> defined in kotlin.collections public fun Sequence.toList(): List defined in kotlin.sequences ``` Das ist das Ergebnis, wenn ich java --version ausführe:  openjdk 11.0.17 2022-10-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-11.0.17+8 (build 11.0.17+8) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.17+8 (build 11.0.17+8, mixed mode) ### Expected behavior _No response_ ### Actual behavior _No response_ ### How to Reproduce? _No response_ ### Output of `uname -a` or `ver` _No response_ ### Output of `java -version` _No response_ ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) _No response_ ### Quarkus version or git rev _No response_ ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) _No response_ ### Additional information _No response_
